name: dangle
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to hang loosely, or to hold something so that it hangs loosely
trans_examp.trans_cn: （使）垂下；（使）悬荡；悬挂；提着来回摆动

example.eg: Loose electric wires were dangling from the wall.
example.egtrans: 松散的电线从墙上垂了下来。

example.eg: He dangled the puppet in front of the children.
example.egtrans: 他在孩子们面前耍木偶。

trans_examp.trans_en: to offer someone something that they want in order to persuade that person to do something
trans_examp.trans_cn: （为了说服某人去做某事而）用…作为许诺，答应用…作为回报

example.eg: I've tried dangling all kinds of offers in front of him to get him to work harder at school, but nothing works.
example.egtrans: 为了让他学习用心点儿，我曾试过种种许诺，可是根本不起任何作用。
